alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:35PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 134 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Melrose Landing, or near Interlachen, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Interlachen, Bostwick, Melrose Landing, George`s Lake, Bardin, Hollister, Florahome, Putnam Hall and Carraway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
